alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 16 at 7:53AM MST until December 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility down to a quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Areas around Nogales and Sierra Vista including Rio Rico and Fort Huachuca. This includes Interstate 19 and Highway 82 north of Nogales as well as Highway 92 and Highway 90 near Sierra Vista. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
